mapper.select: select d.doc_no, d.title, d.writer, d.content, d.request_date, d.end_date, d.status from document d left join docline dl on d.doc_no = dl.doc_no where approver = #{id} and approver_type = #{approverType}
select dl.*, e.emp_name, j.job_name from docline dl left join employee e on dl.approver = e.emp_no left join jobtitle j on e.emp_job = j.job_no where doc_no = #{doc_no} order by lv
